mapper.select: select review_no, review_kind, review_member, review_content, review_date , review_up, review_down, review_work, review_spoiler, review_star,review_contents_type from review where review_no = #{reviewNo}

select count(*) from review
where review_kind = #{reviewKind}

select * from (select rownum rn, temp.* from (select review_no, review_kind , review_member, review_content, review_date, review_up, review_down , review_work, review_spoiler, review_star from review
where review_kind = "1"
where review_kind = "2"
where review_kind = "3"
order by review_no) temp ) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
SELECT review_no, review_kind, review_member,review_content, review_up, review_down,review_work, review_spoiler, review_star, review_contents_type FROM review ORDER BY review_no
select count(*) from review where review_member = #{reviewMember}
select count(*) from review where review_contents_type='영화'
select count(*) from review where review_contents_type='TV'

select * from (select rownum rn, reviewMember.* from (select review_no, review_kind, review_member,review_content, review_up, review_down,review_work, review_spoiler, review_star, review_contents_type, review_date,member_nickname,contents_tname from review join member on review_member=member_no join contents on review_work=contents_no where review_member=#{reviewMember} order by review_date desc) reviewMember) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select count(*) from review where review_member = #{reviewMember}
